name: Specimen203 Mobile
description: This is a fast-paced platformer oriented towards really good optimization and level and game design. It is a difficult game, but it is meant to be played by even people that don't usually play games. Aproximate duration of 30 minutes. Note that this is the mobile web, there is a PC original version avaliable for download on: https://chupiperasaurio-studios.itch.io/specimen
